column2: Chipotle apologizes after Twitter feed hacked overnight Feb 8 Chipotle Mexican Grill Inc's  Twitter account was hacked overnight for about two hours
column3: during which a series of offensive tweets were posted to the account

column2: Morgan Stanley aims to sell stake in Lansdowne Partners - WSJ Feb 8 Morgan Stanley is looking to sell its 19 percent stake in London-based Lansdowne Partners LLP
column3: the Wall Street Journal reported on Sunday.
